author: jstrachan
msg: Added new TagLibraryResolver interface and an implementation using commons-discovery

author: werken
msg: Adding parameterized version of getBodyText() to allow for explicitly
setting escape/unescape mode.  Should we actually inherit from.. where?

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for Ant style adder and setter methods that can be used either on a Jelly Tag implementation or on a regular Java Bean that is bound to a dynamic tag via either <define:bean> or <define:jellybean>
So you can write a tag or bean like this
which can then take nested (say) <fileset> Ant properties etc.
To see this in action, try the demo:jellybean Maven target which demonstrates the use of this technique.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for BeanSource interface, so that you can walk up the tree asking for the beans for <define:bean>, <define:jellybean> style of tags.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched minor bug that dynamic tags would often not be on the parent hierarchy
